name: QtGain
short_description:
QtGain is a simply frontend for MP3Gain, VorbisGain, AACGain and Metaflac which analyses and adjusts your media files so that they have the same volume without the need to reencode the files. 

With QtGain you can simplify this job to replay gain your media files. Simply add your files or folders via drag & drop or select a folder with a file dialog. QtGain starts gaining immediately after adding some files and of course you can add more files while QtGain works on your files.
Files which are already gained and need no recalculating are automatically skipped. Files which cannot processed are automatically listed in a dialog box at the end of the job.
You can now rename all your folders which contains the files and of course the media files too with QtGain. All you need is to switch on the setting and choose a scheme how the folders/files should be renamed.
Its also possible to download covers for your albums.
